Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh conceded 27 runs in the final over of the first innings in the 1st T20I match against New Zealand on January 27, 2023.
Washington Sundar was India's best bowler, picking up 2 wickets for 22 runs from his four overs.
Daryl Mitchell hit Arshdeep Singh for three sixes in the first three balls of the final over.
Post-Match Reflections: Sanjay Bangar credited Daryl Mitchell for New Zealand's late hitting in the game.
Sanjay Bangar praised Hardik Pandya for using the spinners effectively early in the powerplay.
